snippet: Two Saturdays ago, I found myself scaling a mountain in Nepal’s earthquake-battered Himalayan foothills to deliver a bottle of whiskey to an 80-year-old woman.
abstract: Letter from Nepal; Ellen Barry relates her journey through Nepal's Himalayan foothills in wake of devastating earthquakes to deliver bottle of whiskey to 80-year-old woman.

byline.contributor: Ellen Barry is the South Asia bureau chief of The New York Times.

lead_paragraph: Two Saturdays ago, I found myself scaling a mountain in Nepal’s earthquake-battered Himalayan foothills to deliver a bottle of whiskey to an 80-year-old woman.

headline.print_headline: A Long Trek Through Nepal to Deliver a Stiff Drink
headline.main: My Long Trek Through Nepal, to Deliver a Stiff Drink
